data.lyric:
[ti:Sad Beautiful Tragic (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.87]Sad Beautiful Tragic (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift
[00:02.79]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:03.84]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:04.97]
[00:27.28]Long handwritten notes deep in your pocket
[00:34.61]
[00:38.31]Words how little they mean when you're a little too late
[00:45.52]
[00:49.30]I stood right by the tracks your face in a locket
[00:56.95]
[00:59.82]Good girls hopeful they'll be and long they will wait
[01:08.49]
[01:11.12]We had a beautiful magic love there
[01:18.66]
[01:21.78]What a sad beautiful tragic love affair
[01:32.15]
[01:44.64]In dreams I meet you in warm conversation
[01:52.44]
[01:54.75]And we both wake in lonely beds and different cities
[02:03.25]
[02:06.83]And time is taking its sweet time erasing you
[02:14.19]
[02:17.89]And you've got your demons
[02:20.45]And darling they all look like me
[02:25.72]
[02:28.50]'Cause we had a beautiful magic love there
[02:36.14]
[02:39.38]What a sad beautiful tragic love affair
[02:50.11]
[03:02.34]Distance timing breakdown fighting
[03:07.71]Silence the train runs off its tracks
[03:13.46]Kiss me try to fix it could you just try to listen
[03:18.91]Hang up give up and for the life of us we can't get back
[03:29.09]
[03:35.41]A beautiful magic love there
[03:39.63]
[03:42.86]What a sad beautiful tragic beautiful tragic beautiful
[03:53.87]What we had a beautiful magic love there
[04:01.98]
[04:05.14]What a sad beautiful tragic love affair
[04:15.37]
[04:16.47]We had a beautiful magic love there
[04:24.10]
[04:27.27]What a sad beautiful tragic love affair
data.trans:
[ti:Sad Beautiful Tragic (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.87]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.79]//
[00:03.84]//
[00:04.97]
[00:27.28]亲笔书就的千言万语 深藏在你的衣兜里
[00:34.61]
[00:38.31]文字 错过对的时间 便会显得苍白无力
[00:45.52]
[00:49.30]我站在铁道旁 项链坠嵌着你的眼眉
[00:56.95]
[00:59.82]优秀的女孩 前程似锦 却要独自静候在光阴里
[01:08.49]
[01:11.12]我们曾拥有一场爱情 梦幻 美丽
[01:18.66]
[01:21.78]而现在 它是一出美丽的悲剧
[01:32.15]
[01:44.64]梦中相会 我们谈天说地
[01:52.44]
[01:54.75]梦醒时分 我们卧于异榻 置身两地
[02:03.25]
[02:06.83]时光如白驹过隙 甜蜜一夏匆匆而去
[02:14.19]
[02:17.89]我幻化成魔鬼和天使 
[02:20.45]住进你的心里
[02:25.72]
[02:28.50]我们曾拥有一场爱情 梦幻 美丽
[02:36.14]
[02:39.38]而现在 它是一出美丽的悲剧
[02:50.11]
[03:02.34]距离 时间 疲倦的我 挣扎着崛起
[03:07.71]爱的列车脱离轨道 悄无声息
[03:13.46]你吻我 试图弥补 但可否听我诉说一字一句
[03:18.91]百般拖延 最终放弃 只因我们的生活无法继续
[03:29.09]
[03:35.41]那场爱情 梦幻 美丽
[03:39.63]
[03:42.86]它变成一出凄美的悲剧 如此凄凉 如此美丽
[03:53.87]我们曾拥有一场爱情 梦幻 美丽
[04:01.98]
[04:05.14]而现在 它是一出美丽的悲剧
[04:15.37]
[04:16.47]我们曾拥有一场爱情 梦幻 美丽
[04:24.10]
[04:27.27]而现在 它是一出美丽的悲剧
